products.name: AgentForge - Starter
products.description:
# Get Started with Production-Ready Multi-LLM Orchestration

Stop wrestling with different API signatures, rate limits, and response formats. AgentForge gives you a single, elegant Python interface for Claude, GPT-4, Gemini, and Perplexity.

## What You Get

### Complete Framework
- 550+ tests, 80%+ coverage - Production-grade code you can trust
- 4 LLM providers - Claude, GPT-4, Gemini, Perplexity unified under one API
- Mock provider - Test without API keys or costs
- Docker setup - Dockerfile + docker-compose.yml included
- CLI tool - Quick testing from command line
- Streamlit demo app - Interactive provider comparison
- MIT License - Use in unlimited commercial projects

### Core Features
- Unified async interface - Same API for all providers
- Token-aware rate limiting - Automatic throttling
- Exponential backoff - Intelligent retry on failures
- Function calling - Tool use across all providers
- Structured JSON output - Pydantic validation built-in
- Cost tracking - Per-request and cumulative monitoring
- Streaming support - Real-time responses
- 15KB core - 3x smaller than LangChain

### Quick Start (3 Steps)
pip install -r requirements.txt
export ANTHROPIC_API_KEY="..."
python examples/chat_example.py

### Documentation Included
- README.md - Getting started guide
- API_REFERENCE.md - Complete API documentation
- CUSTOMIZATION.md - Provider customization guide
- ARCHITECTURE.md - System design overview
- 4 code examples (chat, function calling, cost tracking, streaming)

## Perfect For
- Developers building first AI app
- Hobbyists exploring LLM APIs
- Students learning AI development
- Side project builders

30-day money-back guarantee. MIT License.

products.name: DocQA Engine - Starter
products.description:
# DocQA Engine - Production RAG in Hours, Not Weeks

Stop paying $300-$1,200 for custom RAG builds. Get a complete, tested, production-grade Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline you own forever.

## Why DocQA Engine?

- Core Size: ~15KB deps (vs 50MB+ for LangChain)
- External APIs: Zero required
- Tests: 500+ (80%+ coverage)
- Evaluation: Built-in metrics
- Citation System: Confidence-scored
- Time to Production: Hours
- Ongoing Cost: $0 (self-hosted)

## What You Get

### Hybrid Retrieval System
Combines BM25 keyword search with dense vector similarity for the best of both worlds.

### 5 Chunking Strategies
- Fixed-size: Fast, predictable chunks
- Sentence-based: Natural language boundaries
- Paragraph: Document structure preservation
- Recursive: Hierarchical splitting
- Semantic: Meaning-based chunking

### Citation Scoring
Every answer includes source citations with confidence scores. Essential for compliance, auditing, and building user trust.

### Production REST API
FastAPI-powered with JWT authentication, rate limiting (100 req/min), and usage metering.

### Streamlit Demo UI
Test documents and queries immediately with the included web interface.

### Built-in Evaluation
Precision, recall, and F1 metrics for continuous retrieval quality assessment.

## Tech Stack
Python 3.11+, FastAPI, Streamlit, ChromaDB, scikit-learn, PyPDF2, Docker

## Perfect For
- AI-powered documentation search
- Domain-specific Q&A bots
- Enterprises migrating off legacy search
- Teams needing accurate, cited answers

30-day money-back guarantee. MIT License.

products.name: Scrape-and-Serve - Starter
products.description:
# Web Scraper & Price Monitor - Scrape Smarter, Not Harder

Define scrapers in YAML. Get price history, change alerts, and SEO scores automatically. No boilerplate code required.

## Why This Toolkit?

- Setup Time: Minutes (YAML config)
- Change Detection: SHA-256 smart differencing
- Price History: Built-in Plotly charts
- SEO Scoring: 0-100 automated
- Monthly Cost: $0 (self-hosted)
- Tests: 370+
- Data Ownership: 100% yours

## What You Get

### YAML-Configurable Scrapers
Define what to scrape without writing code. Just specify URL, selectors, schedule, and change detection method.

### SHA-256 Change Detection
Intelligent differencing that ignores cosmetic changes. Only alerts when content you care about actually changes.

### Historical Price Tracking
Full price history with automatic Plotly chart generation. Track competitors, monitor deals, identify pricing patterns.

### SEO Scoring Engine
Automated 0-100 scoring across 8 factors: meta title, description, content length, headings, internal/external links, image alt tags, load speed.

### Excel-to-Web-App Converter
Transform static spreadsheets into interactive Streamlit dashboards instantly.

### Async Job Scheduler
Cron-like scheduling for background scraping.

## Tech Stack
Python 3.11+, BeautifulSoup4, httpx (async), Pandas, Plotly, Streamlit, APScheduler, Pydantic, Docker

## Perfect For
- E-commerce price monitoring
- Competitive intelligence
- Affiliate marketing
- SEO auditing
- Data pipeline building

30-day money-back guarantee. MIT License.

products.name: Insight Engine - Starter
products.description:
# Data Intelligence Dashboard - From Raw Data to Insights in 30 Seconds

Upload a CSV. Get a complete BI dashboard with predictions, attribution models, anomaly detection, and PDF reports. No ML expertise required.

## Why This Dashboard?

- Time to Insight: 30 seconds
- ML Expertise: Zero required
- Attribution Models: 4 built-in
- SHAP Explanations: Automatic
- PDF Reports: Auto-generated
- Monthly Cost: $0 (self-hosted)
- Tests: 640+

## What You Get

### 30-Second Pipeline
1. Upload CSV or Excel
2. Auto-profiling runs (quality, distributions, correlations)
3. Interactive dashboard with filtering and drill-down
4. Export PDF report for stakeholders

### 4 Marketing Attribution Models
- First-Touch, Last-Touch, Linear, Time-Decay

### Predictive Modeling with SHAP
Classification and regression with one click. Every prediction includes SHAP feature importance explanations.

### Clustering Analysis
K-means and hierarchical clustering for customer segmentation.

### Time Series Forecasting
ARIMA-based forecasting with confidence intervals.

### Anomaly Detection
Statistical and ML-based outlier detection.

### Data Cleaning
Missing value imputation, outlier handling, duplicate detection.

### PDF Reports
Professional reports with executive summary, visualizations, model results, methodology.

## Tech Stack
Python 3.11+, Streamlit, Plotly, scikit-learn, XGBoost, SHAP, Pandas, NumPy, ReportLab, Docker

## Perfect For
- Marketing analysts, data scientists, BI teams, founders, anyone needing quick insights

30-day money-back guarantee. MIT License.

2. **DocQA Engine Starter** ($59) - Production RAG pipeline. Hybrid retrieval (BM25 + vector search), 5 chunking strategies, citation scoring. 500+ tests.
3. **Web Scraper Starter** ($49) - YAML-configured web scraping toolkit. SHA-256 change detection, rate limiting. 370+ tests.
4. **Insight Engine Starter** ($49) - CSV to dashboard in 30 seconds. 20+ interactive charts, 4 attribution models, SHAP explanations. 640+ tests.
5. **Prompt Engineering Toolkit** ($29) - 8 battle-tested prompt patterns. Template manager, token counter. 190+ tests.
6. **AI Integration Starter Kit** ($39) - Multi-LLM boilerplate. Retry logic, caching, cost tracking. 220+ tests.
7. **Streamlit Dashboard Templates** ($49) - 20+ chart templates. Auto-profiling, ML predictions with SHAP. 520+ tests.

## Total Test Coverage: 2,870+ Automated Tests
Production-grade code, not tutorial examples.

Every tool includes:
- Comprehensive test suite (80%+ coverage)

- Complete documentation (README, API reference, architecture)
- MIT License (use in unlimited commercial projects)
